----Stories from the Zone----
-------Fake artifact -------- -----Sidorovich -----
What is going on Sidorovich, why the long face?
Ah, I have got quite the headache at the moment. Take a look at this Goldfish Artifact.
…
About your artifact.
Did you notice something?
It is strange, it looks like a Goldfish and it kind of feels like one, but….
But it is a fake! And what a fake! A perfect copy of a Goldfish! Even got the radiation right! I have never seen a copy like this – and believe me, a lot of people tried to fool old Sidorovich or got fooled and tried to pass it on to me. I even considered myself as an expert, able to discern a fake from a real one by sight only...
How did you figure out that it’s a fake?
By pure chance! An ecologist recently came in - apparently, he owed some money to the wrong kind of people – you understand – and came here trying to pawn a scientific instrument he nicked from their storage rooms: this Artifact Measurement Instrument. “But why would I need an A.M.I.?” – I asked him “Now a nice detector, that is worth something, but an A.M.I.? I got no use for it, and where would I find a buyer for such a specific tool?” Hahaha, I managed to get it from him for 10.000 roubles. “Pawned” of course, but that poor fool will never manage to get out his situation. \n \nSo as soon as he left, I grabbed the first artifact and what did my incredulous eyes witness? A fucking fake!
What is an Artifact Measurement Instrument?
You don't know what an A.M.I. is? It's an instrument used by the scientists to determine the different properties and their values an artifact possesses! Of course they have much better and precise ones in their labs, but this one is a field version! Quite expensive I might add, and quite rare - although most people won't have any use for it.
Maybe the A.M.I is malfunctioning?
I also thought that maybe the Ecologist tried to scam me, trying to load off a broken A.M.I., but I immediately tried it on all my other artifacts and for them it show's their correct properties.
You not only scammed that desperate Ecologist, but it also turns out it was useful to you! You should give back that poor dude the actual value of his A.M.I., at least enough for him to get out of his debt!
What are you talking about? We made a fair deal, I didn't force him to sell it to me - I proposed a price, we bartered a bit and he agreed. Besides, he didn't sell it to me, but pawned it - he can always return and get it back for 12500 roubles. And don't forget that stuff is stolen – he should be happy someone took it off his hands.
Why didn't you check the Goldfish with a detector?
Do you think I'm new at this business? Do you think me a fool? Of course I checked it with a detector, that's like the most basic step everyone knows! I don’t know how the forger managed, but the detector is reacting normally to the fake Goldfish...
Who sold you the Goldfish?
That's the question! It came amongst cargo from the north - from where exactly I don't know.
Cargo from the north?
Mostly stuff Beard bought and sells through my channels, according to our deal he sells through me, and I provision them with weapons, supplies and men. But
What about Hawaiian and Barkeep?
They mostly trade with Freedom and Duty respectively.
What about the two guys from the fleamarket?
Those assholes refuse doing business with me
Who brought the cargo here?
[...]
Well, sucks for you - write it off and forget about it.
What? WHAT? No one - I repeat - NO ONE tries to scam Sidorovich! Besides, do you know what would have happened if I would have passed it on without discovering this fake by pure chance? The visit I would receive? The repercussions? The money I would loose? No, no, this doesn't end here... My friend, I propose you a job - a mighty well paying one too! I want you to find out who produced this fake and how it ended up in my hands. What do you say? Don't let your old benefactor hang in such dire circumstances.
Alright, but I want some proper money for this.
I have to think about it.
I promise you, you will never be hungry again!
Arg, you cruel son of the Zone. Alright, but don't take long!
So where do I begin?
That's a good question... to be honest, I'm not sure myself. There has to be a network of people trading in shady goods - a sort of Black Market if you will. \n \nI have different suspicions: I wouldn't be surprised if these two fuckers from the Flea Market are involved. There is no way that all their goods are from a legitimate source - trash diving my ass - I am sure they are fencing for the bandits in Dark Valley. But there is also no way the bandits would be that good at forging... \n \nThen there is this guy Snitch - the shadiest guy in the Zone - he usually trades in informations no one should have... maybe he also trades in goods no one should have... \n \nWho else? Ah this asshole Owl - I heard some strange things about him: a couple of years ago there was an incident at the Skadovsk between Beard and Sultan. It seemed as if Owl's loyalty was not necessarily on our side, some even say he financed the coup attempt... he is also a good candidate.
A black market in the Zone? Isn't the whole Zone one huge black market?
Sure, but even here there are goods and services your average Stalker would never touch...
A black market in the Zone and you're not part of it?
I resent the implication! I'm a straight businessman! I have a reputation to uphold!
Sounds like I will have to do a lot of questioning... and it's quite expensive to get people talking in the Zone. Give me some cash in order to grease their tongues.
My friend, why would you need an advance? Make a list of your expenses, and I'll reimburse you.
Sidorovich, don't try to cheap out on this one. Give me 10.000 roubles for expenses.
Alright, but don't try to weasle your way out of it later.
Alright, alright, here you have the money. But try to keep expenses on the lower side. \n \nNow go and find the fucker who did this!
Don't worry my friend. \n \nNow go and find the fucker who did this!
About your fake artifact situation.
Yes, are you willing to help an old friend out?
Wh-what do you want?
Are you the guy who has money problems?
I am... what is it to you?
Nothing.
I can maybe help you. How did you end up in this situation?
I am... I have a gambling problem... One night I was playing a game of Faro... It started off well, but at some point my luck turned and I began loosing more and more. The other guy offered me to lend some money, and I thought that I could win everzthing back... in the end my debt grew to 20.000 roubles - worse yet the guy is member of a bandit gang and now he threatens to kill me if I don't bring him his money. They're waiting in the old pig farm in Dark Valley for me... I managed to gahther 15.000 roubles by selling all my belongings and some extra, but I don't know from where I should take the remaining 5.000 roubles...
I can give you the remaining amount.
I can give you the 5.000 you're short and 12.500 to get back your pawned A.M.I. from Sidorovich.
I can take care of your problem for 10.000 roubles...
I can take care of your problem for free.
Are...are you sure? I will never be able to repay you?
Are...are you sure? I will never be able to repay you?
That... that would be wonderful! Are you sure you're willing to risk your skin for me?
Are you sure you're willing to take these bandits on?
[5.000 roubles] Yes, here take the money.
Let me think about it.
[17.500 roubles] Yes, here take the money.
Yes, I will kill these bandits for you.
That... that is wonderful! Thank you very much! You're my saviour.
Your problem has been taken care of Tambov, you're a free man.
God bless you Stalker, I will forever be grateful!
Your problem has been taken care of Tambov, you're a free man.
Andrey Tambov: God bless you Stalker, I will forever be grateful!
---- Sakharov ----
[Fake Goldfish Artifact] Could you check the nature of this artifact?
Sure, what do you want to know?
There is a suspicion that it could be an elaborate fake - can you confirm that it is true?
There is a suspicion that it could be an elaborate fake - can you confirm that it is true?
A fake? But this looks like a real Golfish? Intruiging... \n \nOf course I would like to be of help, but, you know, I'm not supposed to use gouvernment property for private concerns...
A fake? But this looks like a real Golfish? Intruiging... \n \nIn theory I'm not supposed to use gouvernment property for private concerns, but consideriing your help with Vybgello, I believe we can make an exception...
[10.000 roubles] Here have a small 'donation' to the scientific cause.
I have to think about it.
Great, thanks.
Thanks alot, come back in half an hour for the results.
No problem, come back in half an hour for the results.
How you prefer.
Do you have the results?
I do, most interesting artifact you have there. The bad news first: yes it's a fake, but a very advanced one! The forger is very talented, he put a Thistle artifact inside in order to simulate certain effects you would expect from a Goldfish. Increadible craftmanship - such a shame his capabilities is wasted on trying to scam people.
Any other insights?
Not really, there is only so much I can do with the equipment here.
